edu.snu.rixk.model

Class Territory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.rixk.model.Territory

  • public class Territory
extends java.lang.Object
    Territory This class represents a Territory in the game of Rixk. It is owned by a Player, is identified by its unique name, and has adjacent territories to it.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Tim Solum

      • setOwningPlayer

        public void setOwningPlayer(Player player)
        Setter for the new owning Player of this Territory. This removes this territory from the old owner and adds it to the new owner.
        Parameters:
        player - The new owner

        Parameters:

      • getAttackTargets

        public java.util.List<Territory> getAttackTargets()
        Returns a list of possible attack targets from this territory. Possible attack targets include all adjacent territories that are not owned by the player that owns this territory.
        Returns:
        The List of possible attack targets

      • getFortifyTargets

        public java.util.List<Territory> getFortifyTargets()
        Returns a list of possible fortify targets from this territory. Possible fortify targets include all adjacent territories that are owned by the player that owns this territory.
        Returns:
        The List of possible fortify targets

        public java.lang.String toString()
